website_summaries.verdict: A smaller scratch-off map that fits in its included 12.7-inch travel tube.
pros: If you plan on taking your map with you or if you just want something smaller, this is your best bet
A simpler map that still looks great
cons: The small design makes it difficult to scratch off smaller countries

customer_reviews.title: So good I bought two!
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought, the Rose Gold version. I wanted another for my office, but a little smaller. I love my other Luckies of London Scratch Map so I searched their other products and this ticks all the boxes. It's perfect size for a UK A3 frame. I thought I had travelled a lot, but once you actually scratch all the places you have been, it made me realise I have to travel more! I scratches easily and the colours underneath are very clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love these smaller versions
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gifts. These maps are always a winner! Love these smaller versions.
customer_reviews.author: LVDV

customer_reviews.title: She absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for a friend. She absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, as described.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, as described. Very useful and definitely worth buying another. Strong material and versatile. Ease of use every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the perfect gift for travel lovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my fiancé for valentines day to record the places we have and will travel together. I absolutely love it. The surface is sturdy enough s that when you roll it up, it doesn't scratch off in unwanted places, and the storage container is sturdy as well. It arrived quickly and was in great condition. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S. Blakely

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for traveler
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my brother who travels quite a bit. This is really fun idea for someone who wants to conquer the world. The map was a little bit smaller than I expected however it was very easy to scratch off and very nice. These have become really popular in the recent years and I've even seen some that you can frame.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Jean

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is fun to keep up-to-date
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these maps for friends. They look great before you scratch off and after. In fact one of my friends didn't want to scratch off the countries she'd been to because she loved the look of the gold so much. It is a super fun gift for any world traveler. Also you get to feel really satisfied when you are able to scratch off larger countries like the US and Canada.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lindberg

customer_reviews.title: So small
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like how small it was. I was expecting it to be a lot bigger. I was super disappointed. I do like the size because it’s cute but it’s hard to see the states and countries because of how small it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Larson

customer_reviews.title: Cute map
customer_reviews.text: This is cute and serves its purpose, but from a design perspective should have been edited to include less featuristic details as it is such a small size.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Little Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Little expensive price for the quality. Not easily able to lay flat and wish that there were more space to scratch off due to how small it is. Do like the color and the container. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: C&L Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift for a Traveler
customer_reviews.text: This map made the perfect Christmas gift for both my mom and Grandma. They had traveled to more than 10 countries in 2014 alone so this was a perfect way of commemorating that. I also thought the size was perfect. It was a little difficult to frame but with matting, it wasn't a big deal. Would highly recommend this for an avid traveler or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Tichonevicz

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this map!!! It's smaller than I was expecting, but it's really easy to frame and even easier to scratch off. It looks really great in my apartment as decoration, and the back of the map has a few really cool sections that you can write notes about your trips on. I bought one for a summer trip I went on with my partner, and another one for a total of where I have been my whole life. Great purchase, I've even bought some as gifts to friends and family. Really thick paper and it comes in a very strong tube.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift for my travel-loving grandparents and they loved it! Got it around Christmas time and shipping ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for my travel-loving grandparents and they loved it! Got it around Christmas time and shipping was on-time (if not early), which was much appreciated. Per my grandparents, the scratch off is very easy and results are colorful. If anything, they're inspired to travel even more because of it! Good stuff and will likely end up getting one for myself soon!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: So cool! The locations are a little small on this ...
customer_reviews.text: So cool! The locations are a little small on this size, but definitely workable. Good quality and arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haderlie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Perfect for the Traveler on your gift list!
customer_reviews.text: :D I loved this map so much I went back and bought one for myself! Absolutely perfect gift for that world traveler on your wish list. Comes in a full sized poster as well but I like the smaller size, you can even take it with you on your travels! Nice glossy quality. Scratching is a bit more difficult than a lotto ticket but very doable. Takes some time however to scratch off neatly
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as gifts and they are lovely! Very well designed. Not super large, but they travel well.
customer_reviews.author: Cyansunlight

customer_reviews.title: so cool. Seriously
customer_reviews.text: So, so cool. Seriously, what a neat idea. We gifted one to our in-laws for christmas and they love it. It's been really fun for them to scratch off where they've been and they framed it without glass so it makes a nice "interactive" wall hanging.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Good For Presents
customer_reviews.text: Bought this twice for birthday gifts. It's a good size, and scratches off easily. The only issue would be that the lines underneath are not perfectly aligned with the scratch off part, so be careful when scratching off smaller areas.
customer_reviews.author: Mel B

customer_reviews.title: This map was a gift for my boyfriend who plans ...
customer_reviews.text: This map was a gift for my boyfriend who plans to travel. We scratched off a few places with a flat edged toothpick and there was no tearing or problems with the paper. Be aware that some places may be too small to scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift and fun
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and in a lovely package. Bought this as a gift after enjoying the larger map from Luckies myself. It's fun and easy to scratch with family and reminisce over holidays. Would happily recommened for anyone especially as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Customer DB

customer_reviews.title: Fun for anyone starting out on their travels
customer_reviews.text: My sister recently graduated from college and first on her agenda was to begin to explore the world more with her new found income. She loved this present!

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift idea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great gift! My sister and her fiance love to ...

customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone who loves to travel, and he liked it. It is fun for somebody who enjoys traveling or learning about the world.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift.

customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome map!
customer_reviews.text: This map makes you realize that even if you think you've travelled the world, you really haven't! For that reason I like it-- no matter how many cities you've been to in however many countries, this map shows you that it's but a tiny scratch on the surface. The actual map itself (the "travel edition") probably should not be taken along during your travels because the gold covering is VERY prone to scratching, even from wax paper. Hang it up on a wall instead! This is the second map I've bought (the other was their standard size) and I will continue to buy them as gifts for friends--- really a unique gift for those bitten by wanderlust!
customer_reviews.author: White Door

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.

Great way to catalog places one has been and visually appealing. Although, be careful because latex ink (which I assume is what is used on the map) comes off really easily. Don't smudge or place anything on top of the map. Othewise, a fun gift for traveling friends or relatives.

product_meta.title: Luckies of London Ltd Scratch Map Travel Map – Travel Sized Personalized Scratch Off World map Poster, Manufactured in The UK
product_meta.description:
Scratch off Map Travel Edition
Following the enormous success of The Scratch off Map Poster, we now bring you The Travel Edition. This miniature map is still as cool as its predecessor but cuter in every way. It makes the best present for any globetrotter as the map (in its sturdy tube) fits into your rucksack without taking up too much valuable room.

Compact Scratch Map you can on your travels
The idea behind Scratch Map Travel Edition is that you can take it with you as you journey around the globe and scratch off where you’ve been on route – all you do is scratch off the gold top foil layer of the place you have visited to reveal a brand new and wonderful world underneath.

Everyone intends to keep a log or a diary when they are voyaging but in reality you generally just forget, can’t be bothered or get writers block. The Scratch Map Travel Edition is the perfect way to keep a tally of where you’ve been, plus, flip the Scratch Map Travel Edition over and you have even more glorious things to fill in, map out and stick on. Amongst other things, the reverse side of the Scratch Map Travel Edition has a plain white map to allow you the opportunity to plot your route. You can also paste an image of yourself in the ‘before’ box and then ‘after’. The perfect way to assess the tanning progression!

The Travel Edition Scratch Map also has some tops tips on it. For example, did you know that Bulgarians shake their heads from side to side to mean ‘yes’ and nod up and down to say ‘no’? Did you know that cutting down a cactus in America carries a twenty five year prison sentence? Perhaps think twice about bringing home a prickly present for someone. One of the other quirks the map has is sections where you can jot down the music you listened to, the best friend you made and the top 10 highlights. In short, the Scratch Map Travel Edition is brilliant.
feature_bullets: An original Scratch Map by Luckies of London, the inventors of the Scratch off map concept back in 2009
Following the enormous success of the original Scratch off Map, the compact travel edition was born.
Manufactured in the U. K. to the highest standards using premium materials, thick card and easy to scratch off foil.
Travel Sized map, easy to carry, comes with sturdy protective tube, perfect as a gift.
Map dimensions 41 x 29. 7 cm. Tube dimensions 32. 3 x 5. 3 cm.
